verses.verse: Concerning the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Hath <S%H3478>Israel<s%> no <S%H1121>sons<s%>? hath he no <S%H3423>heir<s%>? why then doth their <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3423>inherit<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in his <S%H5892>cities<s%>?

Therefore, behold, the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that I will cause an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%>; and it shall be a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H8510>heap<s%>, and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: then shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H3423>heir<s%> unto them that were his <S%H3423>heirs<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H3213>Howl<s%>, O <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, for <S%H5857>Ai<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>: <S%H6817>cry<s%>, ye <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%>, <S%H2296>gird<s%> you with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>; <S%H5594>lament<s%>, and run to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> by the <S%H1448>hedges<s%>; for their <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, and his <S%H3548>priests<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H1984>gloriest<s%> thou in the <S%H6010>valleys<s%>, thy <S%H2100>flowing<s%> <S%H6010>valley<s%>, O <S%H7728>backsliding<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>? that <S%H982>trusted<s%> in her <S%H214>treasures<s%>, saying, Who shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto me?

Behold, I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H6343>fear<s%> upon thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, from all those that be <S%H5439>about<s%> thee; and ye shall be driven <S%H5080>out<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> right <S%H6440>forth<s%>; and none shall gather <S%H6908>up<s%> him that <S%H5074>wandereth<s%>.
And <S%H310>afterward<s%> I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Concerning <S%H123>Edom<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; Is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> no more in <S%H8487>Teman<s%>? is <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H6>perished<s%> from the <S%H995>prudent<s%>? is their <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H5628>vanished<s%>?

<S%H5127>Flee<s%> ye, turn <S%H6437>back<s%>, <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6009>deep<s%>, O <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%>; for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H343>calamity<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> upon him, the <S%H6256>time<s%> that I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> him.

If <S%H1219>grapegatherers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to thee, would they not <S%H7604>leave<s%> some gleaning <S%H5955>grapes<s%>? if <S%H1590>thieves<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, they will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> till they have <S%H1767>enough<s%>.

But I have made <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H2834>bare<s%>, I have <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his secret <S%H4565>places<s%>, and he shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H2247>hide<s%> himself: his <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and his <S%H7934>neighbours<s%>, and he is not.
<S%H5800>Leave<s%> thy fatherless <S%H3490>children<s%>, I will preserve them <S%H2421>alive<s%>; and let thy <S%H490>widows<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in me.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Behold, they whose <S%H4941>judgment<s%> was not to <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3563>cup<s%> have <S%H8354>assuredly<s%> <S%H8354>drunken<s%>; and art thou he that shall <S%H5352>altogether<s%> go <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>? thou shalt not go <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>, but thou shalt <S%H8354>surely<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of it.

For I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by myself, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%> shall become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%>, a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>, a <S%H2721>waste<s%>, and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>; and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof shall be <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2723>wastes<s%>.

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H8052>rumour<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and an <S%H6735>ambassador<s%> is <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, saying, Gather ye <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> against her, and rise <S%H6965>up<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
For, lo, I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee <S%H6996>small<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and <S%H959>despised<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%>.

Thy <S%H8606>terribleness<s%> hath <S%H5377>deceived<s%> thee, and the <S%H2087>pride<s%> of thine <S%H3820>heart<s%>, O thou that <S%H7931>dwellest<s%> in the <S%H2288>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, that <S%H8610>holdest<s%> the <S%H4791>height<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill<s%>: though thou shouldest make thy <S%H7064>nest<s%> as <S%H1361>high<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>, I will bring thee <S%H3381>down<s%> from thence, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Also <S%H123>Edom<s%> shall be a <S%H8047>desolation<s%>: every one that <S%H5674>goeth<s%> by it shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%>, and shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%> at all the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> thereof.

As in the <S%H4114>overthrow<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> and the <S%H7934>neighbour<s%> cities thereof, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, no <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> there, neither shall a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in it.

Behold, he shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> like a <S%H738>lion<s%> from the <S%H1347>swelling<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> against the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of the <S%H386>strong<s%>: but I will <S%H7280>suddenly<s%> make him run <S%H7323>away<s%> from her: and who is a <S%H977>chosen<s%> man, that I may <S%H6485>appoint<s%> over her? for who is like me? and who will appoint me the <S%H3259>time<s%>? and who is that <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> that will <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me?

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that he hath <S%H3289>taken<s%> against <S%H123>Edom<s%>; and his <S%H4284>purposes<s%>, that he hath <S%H2803>purposed<s%> against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8487>Teman<s%>: Surely the <S%H6810>least<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> shall draw them <S%H5498>out<s%>: surely he shall make their <S%H5116>habitations<s%> <S%H8074>desolate<s%> with them.

The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7493>moved<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of their <S%H5307>fall<s%>, at the <S%H6818>cry<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> thereof was <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

Behold, he shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H1675>fly<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>, and <S%H6566>spread<s%> his <S%H3671>wings<s%> over <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%>: and at that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> be as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> in her <S%H6887>pangs<s%>.

¶ Concerning <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>. <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> is <S%H954>confounded<s%>, and <S%H774>Arpad<s%>: for they have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8052>tidings<s%>: they are <S%H4127>fainthearted<s%>; there is <S%H1674>sorrow<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; it <S%H3201>cannot<s%> be <S%H8252>quiet<s%>.

<S%H1834>Damascus<s%> is waxed <S%H7503>feeble<s%>, and <S%H6437>turneth<s%> herself to <S%H5127>flee<s%>, and <S%H7374>fear<s%> hath <S%H2388>seized<s%> on her: <S%H6869>anguish<s%> and <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> have <S%H270>taken<s%> her, as a woman in <S%H3205>travail<s%>.
How is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> not <S%H5800>left<s%>, the <S%H7151>city<s%> of my <S%H4885>joy<s%>!

Therefore her young <S%H970>men<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in her <S%H7339>streets<s%>, and all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> shall be cut <S%H1826>off<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
And I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, and it shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%>.

¶ Concerning <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>, and concerning the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%>, which <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5221>smite<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H6965>Arise<s%> ye, go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>, and <S%H7703>spoil<s%> the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%>.

Their <S%H168>tents<s%> and their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> shall they take <S%H3947>away<s%>: they shall <S%H5375>take<s%> to themselves their <S%H3407>curtains<s%>, and all their <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and their <S%H1581>camels<s%>; and they shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto them, <S%H4032>Fear<s%> is on every <S%H5439>side<s%>.

¶ <S%H5127>Flee<s%>, <S%H5110>get<s%> you far <S%H3966>off<s%>, <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6009>deep<s%>, O ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> hath taken <S%H6098%H3289>counsel<s%> against you, and hath <S%H2803>conceived<s%> a <S%H4284>purpose<s%> against you.

<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, get you <S%H5927>up<s%> unto the <S%H7961>wealthy<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> without <S%H983>care<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which have neither <S%H1817>gates<s%> nor <S%H1280>bars<s%>, which <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%>.

And their <S%H1581>camels<s%> shall be a <S%H957>booty<s%>, and the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil<s%>: and I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> into all <S%H7307>winds<s%> them that are in the <S%H7112>utmost<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%>; and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H343>calamity<s%> from all <S%H5676>sides<s%> thereof, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> shall be a <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> for <S%H8577>dragons<s%>, and a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>: there shall no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> there, nor any <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in it.

¶ The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> against <S%H5867>Elam<s%> in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of their <S%H1369>might<s%>.

And upon <S%H5867>Elam<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7098>quarters<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> them toward all those <S%H7307>winds<s%>; and there shall be no <S%H1471>nation<s%> whither the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> of <S%H5867%H5769>Elam<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%>.

For I will cause <S%H5867>Elam<s%> to be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%>: and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon them, even my <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, till I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them:

And I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> in <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, and will <S%H6>destroy<s%> from thence the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ But it shall come to pass in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that I will bring <S%H7725%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
